alert.note: Alert for Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Upson and central Talbot Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sprewell Bluff State Park, or 8 miles southwest of Thomaston, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Talbotton, Sunset Village, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Big Lazer Creek Wma, Pleasant Hill and Po Biddy Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
